uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.classification
Class SimpleClassifier

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.classification.SimpleClassifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Classifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
Difference, EqualInterval, NaturalBreaks, Quantile
public class SimpleClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier

A trivial implementation of the classifier interface. It is of little use in its own right but it provides a usefull class for other classifiers to extend.

Version:
0.1
Author:
jamesm

Constructor Detail

SimpleClassifier

protected SimpleClassifier()
A protected constructor, only for use by subclasses.

SimpleClassifier

public SimpleClassifier(double lowerInclusion,
                        double upperExclusion)
Creates new SimpleClassifier A classifier with only one bin which contains the range specided by the two paramiters
Parameters:
lowerInclusion - A double value for the lowest number included in the range of this classifier
upperExclusion - A double value for the smallest number NOT to be included in the range of this classifier
Method Detail

getBins

public com.sun.java.util.collections.List getBins()
The full set of bins provided by this classifer, in order from smallest to largest. There must be no overlap between bin ranges.
Specified by:
getBins in interface Classifier
Returns:
A List containing all of the Bins for this classifier

classify

public int classify(double value)
Finds which bin the specided value falls into.
Specified by:
classify in interface Classifier
Parameters:
value - a double to classify by finding the approproate bin.
Returns:
the index of the Bin which holds the specified value. More infomration on the returned bin can be obtained by calling getBin(binNumber);

getValidRange

public Bin getValidRange()
Gets the full range of values that this classifier can return a sane result for.
Specified by:
getValidRange in interface Classifier
Returns:
Bin A special bin which specifies the full range of values which the classifier can sensibly handle.

getBin

public Bin getBin(int binNumber)
Get an individual bin by index number.
Specified by:
getBin in interface Classifier
Parameters:
binNumber - The int index of the bin to retrive. Bins indexes start from 0 as the bin holding the smallest value.
Returns:
Bin, the requested bin.

getBinCount

public int getBinCount()
Specified by:
getBinCount in interface Classifier
Returns:
int The number of seperate bins in this classifier
